BroadcastCommAudience.name: BroadcastCommAudience
BroadcastCommAudience.description: Represents the audience that the broadcast communication is sent to.

AudienceId.description: ID of the broadcast communication audience.

BroadcastCommAudienceNumber.description: Auto-generated number for the BroadcastCommAudience record.

BroadcastCommunicationId.description: ID of the broadcast communication record.

BroadcastFailureReason.description: The reason the broadcast communication failed to send.

BroadcastType.description: Medium used to distribute the message.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

MessageTimeStamp.description: If BroacastType is Slack, this value is the timestamp when the broadcast Slack message was sent.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

SiteBannerText.description: If BroadcastType is ExperienceSiteBanner, this field contains the banner text displayed on the associated site.

SiteBannerVisibility.description: If BroadcastType is ExperienceSiteBanner, this field contains information about who can view the banner.

Status.description: The status of the broadcast communication.

BroadcastCommAudience.accessRules: To access this object with Service Cloud, enable Incident Management in Setup and set up Broadcast Communications.
